data.sentence: The word أَوْ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كُونُوا comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word قُلْ comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

data.meanings: To deprive from, harden, hide, resist, forbid, prevent, hinder, prohibit access (to a place).
data.sentence: The word حِجَارَةً comes from the root ح ج ر and is associated with the meanings: To deprive from, harden, hide, resist, forbid, prevent, hinder, prohibit access (to a place).

data.meanings: To define a limit, determine (a thing), punish (a culprit), prevent, thrust back, throw back, sharpen.
data.sentence: The word حَدِيدًا comes from the root ح د د and is associated with the meanings: To define a limit, determine (a thing), punish (a culprit), prevent, thrust back, throw back, sharpen.
